PerfectNetExp.abs: UNMOVIC  ... ... turbo pump 涡轮泵 unintrusive 非侵入性 UNMOVIC 联合国监核视委员会; 监核视委.

auth_sentence.content: "It's an unintrusive way to discover new music during the day while doing other things, " O'Neill said in an e-mail to Wired.com.
